itemLabel: Roy Kennedy, Baron Kennedy of Southwark

wikipedia_page.main: Roy Francis Kennedy, Baron Kennedy of Southwark (born 9 November 1962), is a British Labour and Co-operative politician and life peer. He has served as the Opposition Chief Whip in the House of Lords since 2021, and the Shadow Housing, Communities and Local Government spokesperson since 2015.
